sentence: Why the musician sold his computer... it was baroque.
explanation: Baroque refers to a style of art and architecture from the 17th and 18th centuries characterized by elaborate details and grandeur.
first_new_sentence: The baroque period produced many exceptional works of art and architecture.
second_new_sentence: The musicians computer was considered outdated and inefficient, leading him to sell it.

sentence: Whats white and drips from the cloud? the coming of the lord.
explanation: Coming refers to the act of moving toward a specified place or person.
first_new_sentence: The coming of the train was anticipated by the passengers waiting on the platform.
second_new_sentence: The coming of spring brings a renewal of life and growth in nature.

sentence: Note that both meanings are properly centered on single, dictionary-recognized words without relying on homophones.
